text:
This is the talk I gave at the last Future of Coding London Meetup - Back to Basics with Technology. It goes through some of my recent explorations in electronics, crochet and light + a bunch of ideas I’ve been mulling over: <https://youtu.be/Q-rvkIQ0lu8?si=YyzrHUJZnVxbKNo2>

Also in blog form: <https://www.forestinthetree.com/blog/back-to-basics>
